segments.text: I will take it . How much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sure you can do better than that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir . It's the sale price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what about $ 70 with a scarf ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's my rock bottom price . Take it or leave it .
segments.speaker: S2
